Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. #1 Public Health Units -- 0.82 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Public Health Units Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of eighty-two hundredths of one mill (0.82) on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $845,420 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the public health units of the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. #2 Recreation -- 1.65 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Recreation Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of one and sixty-five hundredths (1.65) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,701,150 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating recreational facilities and activities in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. #3 Public Buildings -- 2.49 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Public Buildings Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of two and forty-nine hundredths (2.49) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $2,567,190 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating public buildings in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. #4 Drainage -- 3.34 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 4
(Drainage Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of three and thirty-four hundredths (3.34) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $3,443,540 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating drainage works in the Parish, including the acquisition, operation and maintenance of drainage-related vehicles, machinery and equipment?

Race.SpecificTitle: Water District No. 1 -- 3.57 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Water District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of three and fifty-seven (3.57) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $2,900,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of paying maintenance and operating expenses of waterworks in said District?
